application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details submitted pursuant to reference 24/03194/FUL: external finishing materials (3), construction management plan (4), SuDS (5), landscaping plan (6), refuse and recycling storage (11) and cycle parking (12) in respect of subdivision of site and erection of two storey semi-detached dwelling house and single storey rear extension to existing dwelling.
decision_conditions: The details submitted are inadequate and insufficient to satisfy the discharge of condition 3 (external finishing materials), condition 4 (construction management plan), condition 5 (SuDS), and condition 6 (landscaping plan) of permission ref: 24/03194/FUL and accordingly shall be refused.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: LHA Maximum Height Level: All buildings, structures, and works exceeding 150 metres in height (492.1 feet).
LLA Maximum height level: All buildings, structures, and works exceeding 300 metres in height (984.2 feet)
